name: Splitlands
description:
Game Title: Splitlands

Genre: Visual Novel 

Platform: PC (Windows) 

Description: Follow the story of chief’s young son Santeri and his adventures. On a planet colonized aeons ago, two peoples co-exist: lizardkin a race of inventors and scientists, fascinated by progress and industry, and felines who respect and value the ancient traditions of their ancestors. 

Features: 

-Original Soundtrack and Art

-Original Setting 

-Over 5000 word scenario 

-A choice to change the story 

-Two endings 

-A fighting system 

-Built-in game wiki 

Story: 

SPOILERS AHEAD

 As lizardkin seek to expand North and spread their nation, they send an expedition to the land of felines. Offering them their wealth and knowledge in exchange for their subjugation, however having failed to negotiate, lizards destroy feline settlement, which leads to open hostilities between the two peoples. 

It’s upon young Santeri to take lead among his tribe and find an answer on how to deal with lizards and what path his people should take.
